name: 2-Player Games
description:
------------------>instructions<-----------------

use "arrow keys" to navigate trough options

use the "enter key" to confirm ur option

------------------------------------------------------

player 1: "WASD keys" ("Left Shift" special key)

player 2:"arrow keys"   ("Right Shift" special key)

--------------------->about<-----------------------

this game contains 10  super fun minigames to play with your friends

1. Pong

2. Space Defenders

3. Soccer

4.Battleground

5.Flying Birds

6.Maze Escape

7.Tanks

8.Paint War

9.Racing Cars

10.Craters

------------------->extra info<-----------------------

this game has an joystick function, it doesnt completely work, you can technically play

but it has a weird bug where you cant assign your controller to a certain player but you can to the other player, i will maybe try to fix this but dont get your hopes up, if you see any other bugs, feel free to comment them, that was it! ENJOY!
